sentences.en: A variety of seabirds and shorebirds inhabit the islands, including the endangered brown pelican, least tern, and piping plover.
sentences.cn: 在岛屿上有多样的海鸟及岸鸟栖息，包括濒危的褐鹈鹕、燕鸥、还有笛珩。

sentences.en: American plover of inland waters and fields having a distinctive cry.
sentences.cn: 美洲内陆水域和牧场的鸻,叫声特别.

sentences.en: He wondered if the plover was the fastest bird.
sentences.cn: 他想知道千鸟是不是最快的鸟.

sentences.en: It made landfall at Plover Cove reservoir at 3 pm.
sentences.cn: (?风)于下午三时在船湾淡水湖登陆.

sentences.en: New World plover ( Charadrius vociferous ) a distinctive noisy cry and two black bands across its breast.
sentences.cn: 一种西半球的鸻 ( 双领鸻 ) 有独特的吵闹的叫声,在它的胸部有两道黑纹.

sentences.en: Other species at risk include the red throated diver, golden plover and merlin.
sentences.cn: 危及到的物种还包括红喉潜鸟（red throated diver）、金斑鸻（golden plover）及灰背隼（merlin）。

sentences.en: Plover Cove Reservoir. The location of the Project is shown in Figure 1 of this Permit.
sentences.cn: 船湾淡水湖. 工程项目的位置见载于本许可证夹附的图1.

sentences.en: The animation is based on the symbiosis between the egyptian plover and the crocodile.
sentences.cn: 这部短片是根据埃及一则千鸟与鳄鱼共同生活的故事为题材.

sentences.en: The restoration project has spent millions of dollars on pond habitat for shorebirds like Forster's terns and the threatened Western snowy plover.
sentences.cn: 为保护福斯特的燕鸥和受到绝种威胁的西方雪原船水鸟的栖息地，而进行的池塘自然恢复工程，已经花了数百万的美元。

sentences.en: The two ambulance attendants quickly put Plover on a stretcher and got him into the ambulance.
sentences.cn: 两名救护人员迅速地将普洛弗放到担架上抬进救护车里。

sentences.en: Towards the end of the plover breeding season, the rate of female divorce declines.
sentences.cn: 在鸟的繁殖期快要结束的时候, 雌鸟离婚的比率就下降了.
